loans.name: Dorcas

texts.es:
La señora Dorcas es socia del banco comunal “Las Pomarrosas”, del Distrito Coronel Portillo, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene una hija.
Son cinco ciclos que viene trabajando con los préstamos que le otorga Manuela Ramos cada ciclo, es comerciante de abarrotes, su negocio se ubica en el mercado de su zona y cada día tiene que guardar todos sus productos en un almacén porque no cuenta con un espacio seguro.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 2 sacos de arroz, 2 cajas de aceite, 2 cajas de leche, 2 sacos de azúcar, 4 paquetes de fideo, 10 casilleros de huevo, 25 kilos de fariña, 1 caja de conservas.
Trabaja desde las primeras horas de la mañana  hasta llegada la tarde, es la rutina de todos los días hasta los domingos, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo que trabaja junto a ella.
Está muy agradecida por los préstamos recibidos hasta el momento porque todo lo invierte en su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra.. Dorcas is a member of Las Pomarrosas Community Bank of the Coronel Portillo district, in Ucayali department.  She is 45 years old, married, and has a daughter. Dorcas has had five loans with Manuela Ramos. Her grocery business is located in the local market, and every day she has to put her products in a warehouse as she doesn't have a safe place to keep them overnight. 

With this new loan of S/. 2,000.00 she will buy 2 bags of rice, 2 boxes of oil, 2 boxes of milk, 2 bags of sugar, 4 packets of noodles, 10 boxes of eggs, 25 kilos of flour, and one box of jam. 

Dorcas works from early in the morning until the evening; this is her routine even on Sundays. Her husband helps her with the business. She is very grateful for the loans she's received up to now and invests all of them in her business.

loans.use: Buy rice, oil, sugar etc. for her store

loans.name: Roza

texts.en: Roza is a 55-year-old woman, an IDP, who lives in the IDP Settlement with her husband and three children. She is on a small pension which does not cover her needs. Roza is a vendor who sells different kinds of goods, such as dishes, dowry and other popular items from her house. Her common customers are young ladies and their mothers who want to buy the best for their upcoming married life. Roza's income is 120 AZN. Her husband helps her to bring in merchandise from another city. Roza has applied for a loan of 1,800 AZN to buy Chinese ware, because it is very popular. She promises to repay her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy Chinese ware

loans.name: Margot

texts.es:
La socia Margot pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES,la socia continua dedicandose al negocio de venta y confeccion de cortinas,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia  a su negocio,la socia cose diferentes modelos para los distintos clientes que le solicitan,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de telas al por mayor.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas estbalecidas.
texts.en:
Margot belongs to “The Diamonds” Community Bank. She makes and sells curtains. This business is going well, thanks to the dedication that she gives to her work each day. She sews different styles of curtains, depending on the requests of her customers. She is a responsible and persistent person, as she knows that these traits will help her family succeed. 
She is asking for this loan in order to buy fabric at wholesale prices.
This member is grateful for this loan and promises to pay her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabric at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES,la socia continua dedicandose al negocio de elaboracion de tamales hecho a base de maiz,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria por el centro de la ciudad,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para la elaboracion de sus tamales como maiz y azucar.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to “The Diamonds” Community Bank. She makes tamales out of corn. She has been doing this work for a while. It is going well thanks to her dedication to her work each day. She sells her goods door to door in the center of the city. She is a responsible and persistent person, as she knows that these traits will help her family succeed. 
This member is requesting this loan in order to buy the ingredients used to make her tamales, such as corn and sugar.
This member is grateful for this loan and promises to pay her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients used to make her tamales, such as corn and sugar.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES,la socia continua dedicandose al negocio de restaurante,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia ofrece almuerzo todos los dias ,a la vez la socia sigue ahorrando para aperturar su nuevo negocio de polleria, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para su negocio como aceite y arroz por sacos.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to Los Diamantes Communal Bank. The member continues dedicating herself to the restaurant business.  The member has spent some time in this business which is going well thanks to the hard work she puts into the business. The member offers lunch every day and at the same time the member continues saving to open her new business, a poultry store. The member is a responsible and hardworking person, this being the way the member moves her family ahead.

The member is requesting the loan in order to purchase supplies for her business such as oil and rice by the sack.

The member is grateful for the loan provided and promises to make all her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business such as oil and rice by the sack.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES,la socia continua estudiando la carrera de biologia en una de las universidades del Cusco,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa ,la socia a la vez apoya a su mama con su pequeño negocio ,su mama tiene un carrito donde vende golosinas a los clientes que le solcitan,la socia desea poder seguir estudiando y apoyar a su mama con su negocio.
La socia solicita el credito para pagar sus estudios y para comprar algunas golosinas para el negocio de su mama.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Los Diamantes" [The Diamonds]. She continues to study Biology at a university in Cusco. She is a responsible person and hard-working. 

She supports her mom and her small business. Her mom has a cart where she sells candy to customers. She wishes to keep studying and support her mom with her business. 

The member requests the loan to pay for her studies and to buy some candy for the business of her mom. She feels grateful for the granted loan and promises to fulfill with the established payments.

loans.use: to pay for her studies and to buy some candy for the business of her mom.

loans.name: Iris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES,la socia continua enseñando a estudiantes del tercer grado,la socia a la vez continua estudiando la carrera de contabilidad en una de las universidades del Cusco,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante,la socia enseña durante el dia de lunes a viernes,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando y estudiando para asi poder ser mejor cada dia.
La socia solicita el credito para pagar sus estudios.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: She belongs to the “Los Diamantes” (The Diamonds) communal bank and is still teaching third graders.  At the same time, she’s still attending accounting classes at one of Cusco’s universities.  She is a responsible, dedicated person who gets ahead this way.  She teaches during the day Monday through Friday.  She wants to be able to continue working and studying in order to improve more every day.  She’s asking for a loan to pay for her classes.  She is grateful for the loan granted and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to pay for her accounting classes at the university.

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en:
Ms Shameem, 32 years old, is a very enthusiastic person who has been successfully running a shop keeping business for 1 year. She offers a variety of daily use products and has a good client base. In order to avoid shortages, Shameem needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand.

Shameem has requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices, etc. In this way, she will be able to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.use: To buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices, etc.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 43 years old and lives in a small village in the Telavi district. He is married and has two children and a mother at home. His mother is provided with a retirement pension. According to government estimations, the family belongs to the vulnerable poor category and they receive monthly social assistance.

George runs an animal husbandry business. He owns 2 milking cows and produces dairy products. In addition, he takes wood from the forest and sells it in several villages. George works hard, but his income is hardly enough for food and everyday expenses.

George has requested a loan to repair his house, which is old and damaged. He planned to sell his cow to buy building materials. However, with this loan, he will be able to preserve his cow and expand his dairy business. George will sell his dairy products and increase the family's income. All members will be able to live in more comfortable conditions.

loans.use: to repair the house

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: El señor Rene es natural de la comunidad de Chaqui Kocha A 10 km al norte de Tiraque, actualmente vive en la comunidad con sus cuatro hijos a su cargo de el, la vivienda donde vive es construido de barro con techo de teja tipo rustico. La actividad a que se dedica es la agricultura que se dedica a producir papa, haba y cereales todo estos productos son producidos en los terrenos de herencia de su padre que actualmente vive con su esposa, el  señor prácticamente el crédito que está solicitando es para comprar riego de agua para regar para poder incrementar la producción al año, así de esa manera de mejorar sus ingresos económicos para mantener su familia. En la zona donde vive el señor produce estacionalmente manifiesta que cosecha una ves al año la producción, y los trabajos agrícolas realizan con sus hijos en alguna casos con ayuda de sus vecinos en aine.
texts.en:
Rene is from the Chaqui Kocha community, 10 km north of Tiraque. He currently lives in the community and is in charge of his four children. The house where he lives is built of mud with a tile roof, the rustic style. 

He is engaged with agriculture, producing potatoes, beans, and cereals. All these products are produced in the land he inherited form his father. He currently lives with his wife. 

The loan he is requesting is to buy a water irrigation system to irrigate and thus increase the annual production. Doing so, he will improve his income to support his family. 

In the area where he lives, there's some seasonality. He states that harvest is only once a year. The agricultural work is done with his children and sometimes with the help of his neighbors.

loans.use: to buy a water irrigation system

loans.name: Sirenachayoc Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SIRENACHAYOC”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jackeline Julieta ella es casada y tiene 31 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de tienda de multiservicios,ella tiene una fotocopiadora, tiene computadoras, también vende artículos de escritorio como lápices,borradores,temperas,cartulinas entre otros articulos,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m,la socia anteriormente vivía en la ciudad de Arequipa y trabajaba en una empresa de publicidad, la socia ya tiene 2 años en este negocio, el sueño de la socia es tener una empresa de publicidad. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cartulinas, temperas, lápices y papeles para su fotocopiadora.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo despues la foto porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo y el socio que esta tapado con un punto su cara ya no pertenece al banco comunal Sirenachayoc.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de carpintería, negocio de transporte, negocio de crianza de cuyes y negocio de venta de cereales y negocio de venta de verduras.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank Sirenachayoc, which is a bank located in the district of Cusco, within the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Jackeline Julieta is one of the members. She is 31 years old, married, and has two children. Her business is a multiservice store where she has a copy machine and computers, and also sells stationery supplies such as pencils, erasers, poster paint, card stock, and other items. She is open for sale from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm. She used to live in the city of Arequipa and worked for an advertising company. She has had her own business for two years, and her dream is to have her own advertising company. She is requesting the loan in order to purchase card stock, poster paint, pencils, and paper for her copy machine. The members who appear in small photos along with the group picture had their photos taken later because they could not attend the meeting due to work reasons. The member with his face covered does not belong to the communal bank anymore. 

The other members work in different businesses: carpentry, transportation, raising Guinea pigs, and selling vegetables.

Member Jackeline wants to thank everyone who is a part of this dream and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to purchase card stock, poster paint, pencils, and paper for her copy machine.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: El señor Alejandro tiene 25 años de edad, es de una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos por lo tanto cultiva superficies muy pequeñas, del municipio de Mizque del  departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura  y la pecuaria desde hace 5 años produce cebolla, papa, frejol, para la alimentación de su familia y los excedentes los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Don Alejandro es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de su familia. Don Alejandro, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más semillas de cebolla, papa y frijol, abono químico y agroquímicos, para mejorar la calidad y aumentar su producción y de esta forma tener más ingresos y mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Alejandro, 25, is from a humble family of scarce economic resources which is why he farms on very small plots.  He lives in the Mizque municipality, Cochabamba department.  He’s worked in agriculture and animal husbandry for five years.  He grows onions, and beans for his family’s food and sells what’s left over to local merchants from Mizque.  Alejandro is a much respected person in his community because of his dedication to work and for being responsible for his family.  Alejandro is requesting this loan to buy more onion, potato and bean seeds, chemical fertilizer and other farm chemicals to improve the quality and increase crop yields in order to earn higher income and improve his entire family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La señora Edith, es socia del banco comunal “Santa Rosa De Lima”, del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 45 años de edad, es soltera y tiene cinco hijos, tres todavía son menores y están a su cargo.
Se dedica la venta de refrescos y gelatinas, los refrescos lo venta en botellas y tiene mucha acogida entre sus clientes que prefieren tomar un buen refresco natural, en las tardes prepara sus refrescos para ponerlos a congelar y están bien heladas.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: una olla grande, 1 saco de azúcar, 5 kilos de maíz morado, 1 kilo de limón, ½ kilo de canela, ½ kilo de clavo de olor, 1 tercio de leña.
Tiene que trabajar porque tiene a su cargo a sus tres menores hijos que están estudiando y necesitan de todo su apoyo. Manuela Ramos brinda el apoyo a las personas que necesitan un pequeño capital trabajar  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, por ello Edith está muy agradecida.
texts.en:
Sra. Edith is a member of the Santa Rosa de Lima Community Bank in Yanacocha district, in Ucayail department. She is 45years old, single, and has five children, three of whom are still dependent on her. Edith sells soft drinks and jello products. The soft drinks are sold in bottles, and are well-received by her customers who prefer to drink good natural beverages. In the afternoons Edith makes the drinks and then puts them in the refrigerator until they are well-frozen. 

With this new loan of S/.1,000 she plans to buy a big pot, a bag of sugar, 5 kilos of purple corn, a kilo of lemons, ½ kilo of cinnamon, ½ kilo of cloves, and some firewood.

Edith has to work as she has children who attend school and need all her support. 

The institution Manuela Ramos provides assistance to those who need a small amount of working capital and who wish to improve their family's standard of living. For this, Edith is very grateful.

loans.use: To buy corn, cinammon, sugar etc.

loans.name: Yacine

texts.fr: Mme Yacine habite à 100 m de l’Institution, âgée de 48 ans et mère de 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 26 ans et le cadet 18 ans. Elle évolue dans le commerce depuis 10 ans en vendant                 des mangues, du charbon de bois qu’elle met dans des sachets en plastique devant chez elle où elle dispose d’un Kiosque. Mme Yacine sollicite un prêt de 500 000 f pour l’achat d’une moto Jakarta pour que son fils puisse l’épauler et être occupé en faisant le taxi moto dans la ville. Avec le taxi moto son fils peut gagner au minimum 2500 f par jour. Mme Yacine envisage avec les revenus générés par la moto d’acheter plus de marchandises et développer son activité.
texts.en:
Yacine lives 100m from the institution, is 48 years old and mother to 4 children of whom the oldest is 26 years old and the youngest 18 years old. She has been developing her shopkeeping for 10 years by selling mangoes, and charcoal that she puts in plastic bags in front of her home where she has a Kiosk.

Yacine is requesting a loan of 500,000f to buy a Jakarta motorcycle so that her son can support her and be busy as a motorcycle taxi driver in the town. With the motorcycle taxi her son can make a minimum of 2,500f per day. With the income generated by the motorcycle, Yacine envisions buying more merchandise and developing her business.

loans.use: to buy a Jakarta motorcycle to give to her son who will do the transport.

loans.name: Franz

texts.es:
Franz esta divorciado y tiene dos hijos los cuales están en etapa escolar, viven en una casa en anticretico ocupando dos habitaciones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Alto Obrajes de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja por más de diez horas al día en la comercialización de vinos ya que es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia. 
El crédito lo requiere para elaborar unas etiquetas mejores, cambiar el modelo de las botellas y  mejorar la presentación de los vinos para poder venderlos y de esta forma mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Franz, es crecer en ventas en los mercados para tener mejores ingresos y de esta forma mejorar también su calidad de vida y  la de su familia.
Es la primera vez que solicita el crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Franz is divorced with two school age children.  They live in a two-bedroom house he have under the ‘anticrético’ modality [transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner could lose the property to you].  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s Alto Obrajes zone.

At present he works more than ten hours daily selling wine; he’s is the only one who covers food, education and basic utility costs for his family.  He needs the loan to better display the wines so that he can sell them thus improving his income.

Franz’s dream is to expand market sales in order to earn higher income and thus improve his family’s quality of life too.  This is the first time he’s requested a loan from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: the improve the labels and the shape of the bottles of wine that he sells

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: El señor Carlos es una persona trabajadora, vive en concubinato y es padre de 1 hijo al cual apoya y ayuda en su educación y formación, actualmente es se dedica al servicio de moto taxi en la localidad de Ivirgarzama, él se levanta a muy tempranas horas por la mañana para llevar el sustento a su familia, en sus ratos libres se dedica a la agricultura en una pequeña parcela que su padre le otorgo en su chaco para que él pueda trabajar y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida. el cliente solicita un crédito para compra gallinas ponedoras actividad que le ayudara a mejorar un poco sus ingresos y poder darles un poco de comodidad a su familia, su pareja es ama de casa pero ella esta dispuesta a apoyar a su pareja en la nueva actividad en la cual quieren incursionar, cabe señalar que el cliente cuenta con experiencia en esta nueva actividad por que algunos de sus familiares se dedican a este rubro, el cliente se apersono a nuestras oficinas por un comentario que escucho de sus compañeros de sindicato.
texts.en:
Carlos is a hardworking person.  He lives unmarried with his spouse and is the father of one son who he supports with education and training.  He currently works providing moto taxi services in Ivirgarzama.  He rises very early in the morning to provide sustenance for his family.  In his free time he works in agriculture on a small parcel his father set aside for him in his land so that he could work it and improve his quality of life a little.  

He’s asking for this loan to buy laying hens.  His spouse is a housewife but she’s willing to help her spouse in this new activity they are going to take on.  It’s worth pointing out that Carlos has experience in this new line of work because some of his relatives are in the same business.  He found out about the office through comments he overheard from his fellow syndicate members.

loans.use: to buy laying hens.

loans.name: Kifayat

texts.en:
Kifayat is a 45-year-old woman. She is an internally displace person (IDP) who lives in the Bilasuvar IDP settlement with her parents. She is a farmer and has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 10 years. She chose this business because it is profitable and fresh crops are in high demand. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy. Many national dishes are made of vegetable, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are on every Azerbaijani family table and also are used to make fresh punch.

Kifayat sells her crop in the central bazaar. Her monthly income is 60 AZN. Her father actively helps her to raise her crops.

As this products are in high demand, Kifayat wants to expand her business and produce more fruits and vegetables to cover market demand. For this she has applied for 1,500 AZN. She will buy new garden tools, seeds, and fertilizers, as well as one milking cow.

loans.use: to buy new garden tools, seeds, and fertilizers, as well as one milking cow

loans.name: Shahla

texts.en: Shahla is a 48-year-old woman from Sabirabad. She is married and lives with her two sons. She asked Kiva partner Aqroinvest for a loan to buy new refrigerators and electrical heaters for resale. She is a teacher by profession, but after her husband's death seven years ago, she decided to open an appliance store to support her family's needs. This is not her first loan from Aqroinvest. Shahla is a very honest client and has a good client history. She hopes to further grow her store and to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy new refrigerators and electrical heaters for resale

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a single 22-year-old young man. For the past year he has been operating a mobile phone store. His store is located next to the main street where there is good commercial movement. This has been a profitable business and the only source of income for him.

Saeed is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a collection of mobile phones and accessories. This will attract more customers and increase sales, which will improve Saeed's income. Saeed is photographed in his store.

loans.use: To purchase a collection of mobile phones and accessories

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Thierno

texts.fr: Mr Thierno habite à quelques mètres de l’Institution, ancien sapeur pompier en retraite depuis des années, ce père de famille âgé de 54 ans dispose d’un véhicule R25 qu’il conduit comme taxi clando depuis 5 ans  pour assurer la dépense quotidienne. Il se lève à 6 h du matin pour descendre à 20 h.Il  gagne en moyenne  6000 f par jour et depuis quelques mois sa voiture rencontre des problèmes de moteur et de batterie et ceci l’empêche d’être plus productif et de ce fait il n’arrive plus à joindre les deux bouts.il sollicite un prêt de 350 000 f pour réfectionner la voiture. Mr Thierno veut un jour avoir son parc automobile  et devenir un transporteur.
texts.en:
Thierno lives a few meters from the institution, a former firefighter who has been retired for years, this 54 year old father has a Renauld 25 vehicle that he has been driving as a unregistered taxi for 5 years to take care of daily expenses. He gets up at 6am to come home at 8pm. 

He makes an average of 6,000f per day and for a few months his car has had motor and battery problems which stops him from being more productive and because of this he no longer manages to make ends meet. He is requesting a loan of 350,000f to repair the car. One day Thierno wants to have a car pool and become a transporter.

loans.use: to buy a motor and a battery for a Renauld 25 vehicle which he uses as a taxi.

loans.name: Astou Mbène

texts.fr: Mme Astou Mbene habite dans la ville principale, mariée sans enfants et âgée de 49 ans évolue dans le commerce depuis 5 ans. Elle travaille de 9h à 17 h pour pouvoir satisfaire ses besoins personnels, elle achète des produits halieutiques pour ensuite les revendre sur le marché. Mme Astou Mbène a eu à contracté plusieurs prêts au  niveau de l’Institution et a toujours payer promptement. Elle sollicite un prêt de 300 000 f pour fructifier son commerce afin de gagner plus de bénéfices et avoir un jour sa propre autonomie financière.
texts.en:
Astou Mbène lives in the main town. Married without children and 49 years old, she has been developing her business for 5 years. She works from 9am to 5pm to be able to meet her personal needs. She buys halieutic products to then resell them at the market. 

Astou Mbène had to take out several loans from the institution and always repaid promptly. She is requesting a loan of 300,000f to make her business yield a profit in order to make more profit and one day be financially autonomous.

loans.use: to buy and sell halieutic products.

loans.name: Mary Raquel

texts.es: Doña Mary, es originaria de San Martin Jilotepeque, tiene 35 años de edad ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado, y vacas,(vacuno) actualmente tiene vacas que ya está grandes y se venderán muy pronto, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de dos novillos ya que estos animalitos son muy demandados en el área de San Martin,  espera que le puedan ayudar con el crédito solicitado para seguir adelante con su negocio  y también para seguir ayudando a su esposos en los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Mary, originally from San Martin Jilotepeque, is 35 years old and dedicated to raising cattle. At present, she has mature cattle that she will soon sell. 

Mary is requesting this loan to purchase 2 young bulls, which are much in demand around San Martin. She hopes that you can help her with the loan she solicits so that she can forge ahead with her business and, also, continue helping her husband cover their household expenses.

loans.use: buy cattle to raise and sell at maturity.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Rosa es socia del banco comunal “Santa Rosa De Lima”, de Distrito de Coronal portillo, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos, solo uno de ellos está a su cargo.
Cuenta con una pequeña bodega en su casa, acondicionó un lugar para poder instalar su negocio, lleva trabajando más de seis años  con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, dinero que le ha servido para comprar las cosas que más necesita.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprara: 1 caja de leche chica, 1 caja de aceite, 5 paquetes de papel higiénico, 2 paquetes de fideo para sopa, 1 paquete de fideos tallarín, una caja de conservas, 2 tiras de nescafe, 1 caja de té, 1 caja de lava vajillas.
Con todos estos productos su bodega estará más surtida y podrá vender más productos, en un par de años espera tener una bodega más surtida y mejor acondicionada, agradece a Manuela Ramos por darle los préstamos que solicita cada ciclo.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the communal bank Santa Rosa de Lima, in the district of Coronal Portillo and section of Ucayali. She is 44 years old and is married with three children, only one of which is a dependent. 

Rosa has a small store in her house. She prepared a space to start her business and has been working for more than 6 years with loans from Manuela Ramos. The loan money has allowed her to buy the things she needs most.

With this new loan of 3,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles, Rosa will purchase: 1 small box of milk, 1 box of oil, 5 packs of toilet paper, 2 packs of noodles for soup, 1 pack of spaghetti, 1 box of preserved food, 2 packs of Nescafe, 1 box of tea, and 1 box of dishwashing solution. With these products her store will have a greater variety and Rosa will be able to sell more products.

In a few years, Rosa hopes to have a store with a greater variety of products and better conditions. She is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her the loans she requests during each cycle.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, milk, oil, and preserved food.

loans.name: Vasyl

texts.ru:
У Василия есть свой бизнес - он торгует в небольшом магазине, который расположен прямо во дворе его собственного дома. Василий продает чистящие и моющие средства - порошки, мыла, пасты, пр. В бизнесе ему помогает жена. Василий ездит за товаром в Вергрию (его город находится на границе). Часто привозит товар не только себе, но и другим мелким торговцам.

Василий просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 8,000 гривен на расширение ассортимена товара. Он надеется получиьт дополнительную прибыль и улучшить быт своей семьи.
texts.en: Vasyl has his own business - he sells at a small store, located right in the yard of his house.  He sells cleaning and washing supplies - detergents, soap, paste, etc.  His wife helps him with the business.  Vasyl travels for his merchandise to Hungary (his town is located on the border).  He often brings in merchandise not just for himself, but for other small sellers as well.  Vasyl is requesting a loan in the amount of 8,000 hryvnia to expand his merchandise selection.  He hopes to earn an additional profit and improve his family's welfare.

loans.use: to expand his merchandise selection

loans.name: Khalik

texts.ru: Khalig jenat, u nego 2 detey. On rabotaet  bufetchikom v stolovoy shkoli. Chtobi soderjat semyu luchshe 2 goda nazad Khalig nachal svoy biznes. On prodayet odejdu I tufli I po etoy prichine obratilsa za kreditom v stoimosti 1000 AZN dla togo chtobi zakupit noviy tovar na prodaju. Na budushee on xochet sdelat remont doma I planiruet rasshirit biznes.
texts.en: Khalik is married and has two children.  He works as cafeteria worker at a school cafeteria.  Khalik started his own business two years ago in order to support his family better.  He sells clothing and shoes, and requested a loan in the amount of 1000 AZN in order to purchase new merchandise for sale.  In the future, he wants to make repairs at home and plans to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase new merchandise for sale

loans.name: Isomiddin

texts.ru: Исомиддин проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Он родился 1978 году. Исомиддин женат. У него двое детей. Исомиддин уже шесть месяцев занимается торговлей. Он открыл магазин, где продает продукты питания и хозяйственные товары. Исомиддин просит кредит для приобретения парфюмерии.
texts.en: Isomiddin lives in the J. Rumy district.  He was born in 1978.  Isomiddin is married and has two children.  He has been involved in sales for six months.  He opened a store, where he sells food products and household goods.  Isomiddin is requesting this loan to purchase perfumes.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes

loans.name: Khushbakht

texts.ru: Хушбахт 40-летняя жительница города Истаравшан. Она разведена. У нее трое детей. Хушбахт вместе с дочерьми занимается шитьем. Она в основном шьет национальные платья и учит дочерей шитью. В этой области она шесть лет. Хушбахт берет кредит для покупки тканей и ниток.
texts.en: Khushbakht is a 40 year-old resident of the city of Istaravshan.  She is divorced and has three children.  Khushbakht and her daughters are involved in sewing.  She primarily sews national dresses and teaches sewing to her daughters.  She has been in this field for six years.  Khushbakht is requesting this loan to purchase fabrics and threads.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics and threads

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La señora Elsa es socia del banco comunal “Santa Rosa De Lima” del Distrito Coronel portillo, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos, su esposo trabaja como docente (profesor)
Hace diez años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles pagará el pedido de este mes.  Ella vende sus productos al crédito, de esa forma puede dar facilidad a sus clientes y puedan cancelarlo sin problemas.
De esta manera trabaja para poder ayudar a su esposo con algunos gastos que se generan en el hogar, siempre está guardando su capital para volverlo a invertir en más productos, gracias a Manuela tiene esta oportunidad de acceder  a un crédito sin más requisitos, solamente es tener las ganas de trabajar.
texts.en:
Elsa is a partner in the community bank "Santa Rosa de Lima" from the district Coronel Portillo, department of Ucayali.  She is 43 years old and is married with three children.  Her husband works as a teacher.

She has worked for ten years with loans from Manuela Ramos.  She works selling cosmetic products by catalog.  With her new loan of 1500 nuevos soles, she will pay for this month's order.  She sells her products by credit so that she can better serve her clients and so that they can cancel without problems.  

She works in this way to be able to help her husband with some of the expenses that come up at home.  She is always saving her earnings to be able to invest it in more products.  Thanks to Manuela, she has this opportunity to access a loan without more requirements, with only her desire to work.

loans.use: to pay for this month's cosmetic orders.

loans.name: Two In One United Group

texts.en:
Fatmata is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. She was born in Masongbo Loko village, about 37 years ago. She is married to a businessman and the couple has 4 children, 2 of them are attending primary school and the others are in secondary school. For many years now, Fatmata has been selling rice and groundnut/peanuts, etc. 

Fatmata and her group members are requesting for their second SMT/Kiva lenders loan. Previous loans have made a huge impact on the lives and businesses of these borrowers. Having completed repaying the previous loan, they are again requesting for a new loan of 500,000 (SLL) Sierra Leonean Leones for each, in order to further develop their respective businesses. Group leader Fatmata will again use her share of the loan to buy rice and groundnuts in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy rice and groundnuts in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина проживает в районе Гончи рядом с городом Истаравшан. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее муж находится на заработках за рубежом. Сама Мадина занимается скотоводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот. Этим видом деятельности она занимается восемь лет. Мадина просит кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Madina lives in the Gonchi district near the city of Istaravshan.  She is 26 years old, married and has two children.  Her husband is working abroad.  Madina is involved in animal husbandry.  She breeds cattle.  She has been in this type of business for eight years.  Madina is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Doniyor

texts.ru:
Дониёр житель города Истаравшан. Ему 36 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Дониёра домохозяйка. Его дети учатся в школе. Сам Дониёр предоставляет услугу, он занимается съемками. Он в основном предоставляет свои услуги на свадьбах и мероприятиях. В этой области он уже 14 лет. 
Дониёр просит кредит для приобретения еще одной видеокамеры.
texts.en: Doniyor is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 36 years old, married and has three children.  His wife is a homemaker.  His children attend a school.  Doniyor provides a service; he is involved in filming.  He primarily provides his service at wedding and events.  He has been in this field for 14 years.  Doniyor is requesting this loan to purchase another video camera.

loans.use: to purchase a video camera

loans.name: Sohibnazar

texts.ru: Сохибназар житель города Истаравшан. Ему 39 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Сохибназар зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Он разводит скот у себя дома. В этом ему помогает его жена. Он более десяти лет занимается животноводством. Кредит просит для закупа бычков с целью увеличения поголовья крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Sohibnazar is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 39 years old, married and has four children.  Sohibnazar earns a living by breeding cattle.  He breeds livestock at home.  His wife helps him with this business.  Sohibnazar has been involved in animal husbandry for over ten years.  He is requesting this loan to buy bulls in order to increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Duo Noveno San Pedro Group

texts.es: Duo Noveno San Pedro, La señora Sonia Yanira, vive en Canton San Francisco en Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez, al lado de su familia está muy feliz por el apoyo incomparable que  le brindan apoyándola en todo, es una mujer muy emprendedora, su negocio es una tienda pero ella ha logrado alcanzar una meta más de su vida  la cual es una  venta de papas en la orilla de la carretera del cantón donde  ella vive. Ya  que siempre los trabajadores le preguntaban si no vende almuerzos entonces ella logro la compra de una carreta y ahora vende papas fritas, pollo frito, y también las señoras preguntan por verduras así que ella vende algunas verduras.  El dinero no le alcanza entonces se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para poder ofrecer a las personas lo que piden tanto en papas como en verduras y así seguir luchando por sus sueños que es seguir prosperando en todo.
texts.en:
A member of Duo Noveno San Pedro, Sonia Yanira lives in the canton of San Francisco in the town of Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez, together with her family.  She is very happy for the help that they give her in everything.  She is a very entrepreneurial woman.  Her business is a store, but she has also accomplished another life goal, which is the sale of fried potatoes on the edge of the highway in the canton where she lives.

Since the workers always asked her if sold lunches, she was able to buy a cart and now she sells french fries and fried chicken.  The ladies also ask for vegetables and so she also sells some vegetables.  

The money isn't enough, so she sees the need to ask for another loan to be able to offer people what they ask for both in potatoes and in vegetables and in this way continue struggling for her dream, which is to continue prospering in every way.

loans.use: to buy potatoes to fry and sell and to buy vegetables to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Amanecer Group

texts.es:
El Comité Amanecer nace en el  barrio Chaipé en Encarnación, se encuentran  en el 20º ciclo.
Una de las integrantes del grupo la Sra.Mirtha se dedica a la venta de joyas como aros, collares, pulseras y también se dedica a la confección de ropas.Con estas actividades ella logra salir adelante y ser sustento de su hogar.
El crédito que recibe de la fundación lo utiliza para la compra de mercaderías como ropas, hilos, agujas y telas para realizar su trabajo de costurera.
texts.en:
The Amanecer ("Wake up") Committee was created in the neighborhood of Chaipé en Encarnación.  They are currently in their twentieth cycle.  One of the members of the group, Mrs. Mirtha, works selling jewelry, like rings, necklaces, and bracelets.  She also works making clothes.  With these activities she succeeds in getting ahead and sustaining her home.  

The committee will use this loan for the purchase of merchandise like clothes, thread, needles, and fabric to complete their seamstress work.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like blouses, pants, thread, fabric, etc.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her father appears in her Kiva profile photo. Yasmeen is a 19-year-old single young woman, her father is employed and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover their costs.

Yasmeen is studying at the university, specializing in Business Administration. Yasmeen wants to complete her studies and pay the university fees, so she is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover her university fees. This will ensure a better future for Yasmeen and improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the university fees.

loans.name: Maria

texts.ru:
Мария замужем. У нее двое взрослых сыновей. Мария имеет собственный бизнес.

Мария торгует женской одеждой на центральном рынке города.  Она продает платья, крутки, пиджаки и искусственные  дубленки. Мария имеет свой магазинчик, но землю под ним арендует.  Ее опыт работы 20 лет. Мария трудолюбивая, отзывчивая и прилежная. Она справлялась со всеми трудностями кризиса, который был в стране.

Мария просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 6000 гривен на закупку женской осенней коллекции.
texts.en: Maria is married and has two adult sons.  She has her own business.  Maria sells women's clothing at the city's central market.  She sells dresses, jackets, blazers and imitation sheepskin coats.  Maria has her own store, but leases the land under it.  She has 20 years of work experience.  Maria is hardworking, responsive and diligent.  She handled all of the difficulties of the crisis that happened in the country.  Maria is requesting a loan in the amount of 6,000 hryvnia to purchase women's fall clothing collection.

loans.use: to purchase women's fall clothing

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a married man. He has a son who is 3 years old. He describes himself to be visionary man. He operates a retail store where he sells household items such as sugar, salt, flour, sweets, milk, cakes etc. He has been involved in this business for 3 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located within a residential area and his primary customers are local residents. 

John describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of enough funds for improving the business. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more household items to resell. His business goal is to run a bigger retail shop within 5 years. He hopes that, in the future, he will run a shopping mall.

loans.use: to buy household items.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George  is a married man. He has 4 children, ages ranging from 4 years to 13 years. He describes himself to be determined man. He operates a farm where he sells sheep. He has been involved in this business for 20 years. His business is located within a suitable agricultural farm and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for expanding the business. 

George will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy sheep to resell. His business goal is to run a well established business within 5 years. He hopes that he will be able to increase the number of sheep on his farm in the future. This is his first loan.

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell.

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en:
Haleema is 50 years old, married, and has six children. She has a small restaurant where she cooks food with the help of her husband. She started this business five years ago when she requested her first loan from Kashf Foundation. She provides three to four dishes at lunch and dinner and tea throughout the day. She provides food at a very reasonable cost and her target market is the labor class.

Haleema is requesting for a loan for  45,000 PKR, which she will use to purchase new furniture and utensils. She is hopeful that she can increase her income by providing quality food at a reasonable cost and improve the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture and utensils.

loans.name: Osmar

texts.es:
Osmarde 26 años viven en la  casa de sus padres, hace 3 años que el él puso una tienda de video juegos en su casa para que los niños y adolescentes puedan entretenerse y así poder asegurar un futuro profesional a su hija.
El se dedica a esta actividad con lo que logra mantener a su familia.
El crédito que está solicitando es para el mantenimiento de los aparatos de video juego ya que cada vez cuenta con mas clientela.
texts.en:
Osmar is 26 years old and lives in his parents' house. Three years ago, he opened a video game shop in his house so that children and teenagers could entertain themselves and he could ensure a professional future for his daughter. He spends his time working in this business, with which he is able to support his family.

The loan that he is requesting is for the maintenance of the video game machines, since he has more customers all the time.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his video game machines.

loans.name: Fetanete

texts.en:
Fetanete is a 42-year-old married woman. She lives in the southwest part of Kosovo, which has the second-largest population after the capital city, with four of her children. She is a housewife taking care of her children. Fetanete's husband works in Slovenia to support his family. He works hard there in order to one day improve the living conditions for their family.

Fetanete works hard to take care of her children and her house; however, the house does not possess the elementary basic necessities such as a kitchen or a bathroom toilet. She doesn't have enough money to buy these items, so she is asking for a loan of 1,000 Euros (EUR) to buy new kitchen appliances such as a stove and other basic things, and to renovate the toilet. She is hoping to improve the living conditions and to live together with her family in good conditions.

Fetanete thanks KosInvest – Kiva lenders for improving the family's conditions and standard of living.

loans.use: to buy new kitchen appliances, such as a stove, and to renovate her toilet.

loans.name: Gaioz

texts.en:
Gaioz is 60 years old and lives in the Gori district. He lives with his wife, son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Gaioz’s son is a serviceman and gets a monthly salary. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they own a plot of land where a wide variety of delicious fruit is grown: peach, apple, quince, sweet cherry. Gaioz sells fruits in the nearby villages. He works as a worker to get additional income. He is a very hard-working man, with a rich experience in his work.

Gaioz requested a loan to purchase a milking cow and build a cattle shed. He plans to run a dairy business. Gaioz will purchase building materials for the cattle shed, and after the building is built, he will purchase livestock and sell milk, cheese and other dairy production locally. He will be able to increase the income of the family and improve their living conditions. Gaioz awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a milking cow and build a cattle shed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to paint the house.

loans.name: Mwajuma

texts.en:
Mwajuma is a single mother of five children and all her children go to school. She has a business of selling green bananas and has been in this business for 6 years. She has applied for a loan of 1,300,000 Uganda shillings from MCDTSACCO to buy more bunches of green bananas. She works at the market and works six days out of every week. 

Mwajuma sells to all categories of people, but on retail. Her major business challenges include transportation and seasonality. She is aspiring to see her business grow big so that she can own a delivery van to ease in transportation and she would also like to build her own house. The family resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity, but no piped water. Her monthly expense include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of bananas.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es: El Sr. Arturo de 51 años de edad es separado de su esposa y vive solo, por lo tanto no tiene dependientes económicos. A pesar de las circunstancias en las que se ha visto envuelto a lo largo de su vida, a podido salir adelante y luchar por lo que realmente es importante su bienestar. El está trabajando en una empresa dedicada a la venta de materiales para construcción. Arturo en esta ocasión está solicitando de nuestra ayuda para terminar de construir la planta alta de su domicilio.
texts.en:
Arturo is 51 years old. He is separated from his wife, and lives alone, so he does not have dependents. Despite the circumstances in which he has found himself throughout his life, he has been able to move forward and struggle for what really is important: his well-being. 

He is working for a company that sells construction materials. On this occasion, Arturo is requesting our help in order to finish building the upper floor of his home.

loans.use: To finish building the upper floor of his house.

loans.name: Edelira

texts.es:
La señora Edelira es soltera y vive en su propia casa, se dedica a la venta de mercería, cuenta con local propio, y  cuenta con una  clientela bien formada y por lo tanto con buen ingreso mensual.
Edelira es una persona muy trabajadora,con deseos de salir adelante, su deseo es agrandar su negocio y poder ir así satisfaciendo mas necesidades de su clientela.
El propósito del crédito es para la compra de mas mercaderías asi satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes  y aumentar sus ventas diarias ganando la fidelidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Edelira is single and lives at her own home. She is engaged in sales in her notions store. She has her own premises and has a good amount of customers and thus she has a good monthly income.

Edelira is a hard-working person, she hopes to get ahead, and her wish is to enlarge her business and therefore be able to meet more customer needs. 

The purpose of the loan is to buy more merchandise and meet the needs of her clients. Her wants to increase her daily sales and gain customer loyalty.

loans.use: to buy buttons, needles, lingerie, etc.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 48 year old married man. He has 9 children with ages ranging from 12 years to 22 years. He describes himself to be caring man. He operates a retail business where he sells firewood. He has been involved in this business for 12 years and employs 2 staff members. His business is located within a suitable residential environment and his primary customers are the general public. 

Robert describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving the business. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy a new bicycle for selling firewood to customers. His business goal is to run a well established retail business within 5 years. He hopes to buy a motorbike in the future for distributing firewood to customers.

loans.use: to buy one more bicycle.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua is single and has three children. She has received no formal education. Ekua sells salted fish and used clothing in Krofoforao, near Abura, which she has done for eight years. Ekua uses her income to pay for her grandchildren's school fees. Ekua will use the loan to purchase fish in bulk. With the new profits, Ekua plans to expand her business.

loans.use: buy fish in bulk to resell

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose  is married and has four children.  All her children go to school.  She has a business of a mini bakery frying samosas, donuts and pancakes. She has been in this business for 10 years and works seven days out of every week.  She works from her home and sells to all categories of people on retail.  Besides this bakery business she also generates additional income through fetching and selling water.  Her major business challenges include thieves and defaulters.   

Rose has applied for a loan of 200000 Ugandan shillings from MCDTSACCO to buy more cooking oil, wheat flour, sugar and cow peas.  

Rose resides in her own house and the family has no access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes  school fees and medication.

loans.use: buy ingredients for her bakery

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is married and has five children. She received schooling through junior high school. Patricia sells corn dough in Krofoforao, near Abura, which she has been doing for six years. Her husband is a driver. 

Patricia is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase maize in bulk.  Patricia uses her income to pay for school fees. With the new profits, Patricia plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize in bulk.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martín, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de telas de diferentes colores, hilos, para poder realizar las confecciones de ropa, también necesita invertir en algunos materiales de construcción, para realizar una reparación en la vivienda por ejemplo se comprará cemento, piedra y hierro, este financiamiento le ayuda a cubrir ciertas necesidades tanto del negocio como personal.

Con el préstamo anterior logró comprar lo necesario para la elaboración de uninformes de una escuela, en su familia su condición está mejorando, ya que estos proyectos que ha recibido le han permitido también incrementar su negocio y poder mejorar la capacidad en las máquinas.
texts.en:
Martín requests a new loan to buy fabric in various colors and thread to make clothes and also needs to buy building materials to do some home repairs.  He will buy cement, stone and iron, for example.  This financing will help him cover some needs, both business and personal, he has.

He was able to buy what he needed to manufacture school uniforms with the previous loan.  His family condition is improving since these projects have led to increased business and he’s been able to increase his machines’ capacity.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, cement, stone and iron.

loans.name: Esmeralda Eugenia

texts.es:
Esmeralda, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder continuar surtiendo en su negocio, en esta ocasión comprará juguetes de varias clases, también invertira en la compra de una máquina donde se almacenan juguetes, son un juego para los niños, este préstamo considera que le dará un mejor funcionamiento.

Su experiencia con los préstamos anteriores ha sido muy efectiva, ya que ha logrado crecer y mantener surtido con productos a bajo costo, y en sus familias la condición está cambiando siendo cada vez más productiva.
texts.en:
Esmeralda has decided on a new loan to continue stocking her shop.  On this occasion she will buy more toys of various kinds and will also buy a machine that stores toys and is a game for children.  She believes this loan will help her function better.

Her experience with previous loans has been very effective because she’s grown and managed to keep her store stocked with low-price products.  Her family’s condition is changing becoming more productive all the time.

loans.use: to buy toys and a claw toy machine.

loans.name: Serah

texts.en:
Serah is a married woman. She has 4 children with ages ranging from 2 years to 6 years. She describes herself to be dedicated woman to her work. She operates a tailoring business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for 4 years and employs 1 staff member. Her business is located at a local residential area and her primary customers are local residents. 

Serah describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of clothes materials. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy fabric for making clothes, such as men and women suits, blouses, shirts etc. Her business goal is to be a supplier of dresses to shopping mall within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will run a big clothes fashion and a boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothes materials.

loans.name: Serzhik

texts.en:
Serzhik is still running his butcher shop. Now his shop is located in a more crowded place, and thanks to that fact, it is visited by more customers. 

Thanks to his business, Serzhik is able to provide for his family. He spent his previous Kiva loan on the purchase of a large lot of meat for his business. Now he needs a 400,000 AMD loan to buy another large lot of beef, pork and also dairy products for his business.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of beef, pork and dairy products for his business

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a married man with two children ranging in age from three to six years. He describes himself as tolerant and energetic. George operates a motorcycle with which he provides transportation services. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located along a tarmac  road, and his primary customers are pedestrians and business people. He says his biggest business challenge is insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy motorcycle spare parts so as to be able to meet the high customer demand. His goal is to save for purchasing another motorcycle. In  the future, George plans to expand his business operations to more customers.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Araba

texts.en: Araba is married and has three children. She has received schooling through senior high school. Araba sells yams and a local soft drink in Krofoforao, near Abura, which she has for since ten years. Her husband is a mason. Araba uses her income to pay for school fees. Araba will use the loan to purchase yams and ingredients for her drinks in bulk. With the new profits, Araba plans to expand her business.

loans.use: buy yams and drinks ingredients

loans.name: Araba

texts.en:
Araba sells fante kenkey (fermented maize dough wrapped in banana leaves) in Krofoforao, near Abura. Araba has received no formal education.  She is a widow and has three children. 

Araba has been selling fante kenkey for the past fifteen years. She is responsible for paying school fees and other expenses. Her loan will be used to buy maize in bulk. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to continue to support herself and her family.

loans.use: buy maize in bulk

loans.name: Kutuma

texts.en: Kutuma is married and has three children. She has received schooling through junior high school. Kutuma sells second-hand clothing in Krofoforao, near Abura, which she has done for six years. Her husband also sells second-hand clothing. Kutuma uses her income to pay for school fees. Kutuma will use the loan to purchase clothing in bulk. With the new profits, Kutuma plans to expand her business.

loans.use: purchase clothing in bulk

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a single mother of two children, both her children go to school.  She operates a kiosk at the market and has been in this business for 7 years. She works seven days a week. 

Christine has applied for a loan of 200,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy cooking oil,  wheat flour, sweet bananas and cassavas for making cassava chips.  Her major business challenges include seasonality and thieves. She is aspiring of becoming a wholesaler and also to build a  house. 

Christine resides in a rented house and her family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and paying for electricity bills.

loans.use: buy ingredients to make food for sale

loans.name: Adulfa

texts.en: Adulfa is 62 years old and lives in Catagbacan Norte, Loon, Bohol. She has been engaged in the fishing business since 1980. Her husband is a fisherman and also works as a carpenter.  All her four children are grown and Adulfa needs to look after their own needs. She is asking for a loan to buy a new fishing net, nylon to repair the old ones and fishing hooks. Adulfa and her husband work hard together so they can save enough to enjoy a comfortable life.  In the future, she would like to have a more stable fishing business so she and her husband can retire in comfort.

loans.use: buy fishing net, nylon and fish hooks

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El comité "San Francisco" tiene 15 integrantes en su mayoría señoras artesanas de Caranday que dedican su tiempo a la realización de sombreros, pantallas o teñidos de colores muy hermosos.
La Señora Ana es también artesana y se dedica a la fabricación de sombreros coloridos y vistosos que se usan para cualquier ocasión.
El crédito sería para cubrir los gastos de la materia prima como agujas, hilos, pinceles, etc y con ello obtener un mejor ingreso para cubrir las necesidades de sus familias.
texts.en:
The "San Francisco" communal bank has 15 members, a majority of whom are craftspersons from Caranday, who devote their time to making very lovely hats, fans or dye work. 

Ana is also a craftsperson and makes bright and colorful dyed hats that are used for any occasion.

The loan would be to cover the expenses of materials such as needles, thread, paintbrushes, etc., and this way earn better income to cover family necessities.

loans.use: To buy needles, thread, paintbrushes, etc.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.es:
Luciano se dedica desde hace mas de 5 años a la compra - venta de artículos para el hogar, lo realiza de forma ambulante.
El es una persona que busca salir adelante con esta actividad por lo tanto se dedica con esfuerzo y empeño en busca de un futuro mejor.
El Señor solicita el crédito para comprar mercaderías como cubiertos, sábanas, y ropas con el objetivo también de ir generando mayor ingreso para poder montar su propio local de ventas.
texts.en: Luciano has been working for more than five years buying and selling items for the home from place to place.  He is a person who seeks ways to get ahead by means of this activity so he puts much effort and dedication into the search for a better future.  He’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise like table settings, sheets and clothes to start generating higher income so that he can open his own store.

loans.use: to buy table settings, sheets, comforters, tablecloths, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her education.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Trabajadoras esta integrada por mujeres que desarrollan actividades independientes y diversas como la cría y venta de animales, la compra de alimentos balanceados para alimentarlos.
Una de las integrantes, la Señora Lucina se dedica a la cría de animales, es un trabajo al que le pone mucho empeño y cariño ya que no sólo tiene que cuidarlos sino alimentarlos, bañarlos, brindarle un espacio amplio, etc., es con esta actividad que ella logra sustentarse día a día y también a su familia.
El crédito utilizado sería para re-inventir en el negocio, poder ir teniendo mayor variedad de animales que criar y luego poderlos vender y así generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Mujeres Trabajadoras" is made up of women who are developing a variety of independent businesses, such as raising and selling animals and buying animal feed for them. 

One of the members, Lucina, raises animals.  She puts a lot of care and effort into her work, because not only does she care for the animals but she also feeds them, bathes them, provides them with sufficient space, etc.  With this business, she manages to support herself and her family.  

She will use this loan to re-invest in her business.  She will obtain a greater variety of animals to raise and later sell, this way generating more income.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed for the growth of her animals

loans.name: Hezekiah

texts.en: Hezekiah is a married man. He has 4 children with ages ranging from 2 years to 7 years. He describes himself to be an industrious and energetic man. He operates a bicycle where he provides transportation services. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in a busy place where residents travel a lot and his primary customers are business people. He describes his biggest business challenge to be few customers who ask for the transport because his bicycle is seen as old(outdated). He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy bicycle spare parts. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will use the profits made to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare parts.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita sells rice, flour and meat pies in Krofoforao, near Abura. Anita went to school through middle school. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a mason. Anita has been selling rice, flour and meat pies for the past 15 years. She is responsible for paying school fees for her children. Her loan will be used to buy rice, flour and meat in bulk. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour and meat in bulk.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 60 years old and married to Joseph. They are blessed with three children. Esther is a dairy farmer and plans to use the loan to buy another calf. She has been in business for 12 years, earning a monthly income of 30,000 shillings.

This will be her second loan with KADET LTD. She plans to use the profit to buy more cows and pigs. Her dream and hope is that she will be a successful farmer.

loans.use: To buy another calf

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama, who achieved a junior high school level education, is divorced, has two children, and is responsible for paying school fees and other household/living expenses.  For the past seven years she  has been selling cassava and plantains in Krofoforao, near Abura. Ama will use her loan to buy cassava and plantains in bulk, and will use the resulting new business profits to continue to care for her family.

loans.use: to buy cassava and plantains in bulk.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
La señora Petrona es casada y tienen dos hijas, estudió corte y confección y cuenta con un taller propio de costura donde hace todo tipo de prendas de vestir.
Ella se esfuerza bastante por salir adelante día a día para así tener un futuro mejor para ella y su familia.
El préstamo solicitado sería para comprar las materias primas como hilos, agujas, telas, cintas así como revistas, etc para poder practicar y al mismo tiempo vender sus productos.
texts.en:
Petrona is married and they have two daughters. She studied dressmaking and has her own sewing workshop where she makes all types of clothing items.

She strives very hard to succeed day by day, to in this way have a better future for her and her family. 

The requested loan would be to buy materials such as thread, needles, fabrics, ribbons, as well as magazines, etc. so that she can carry on her work, and at the same time sell her products.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Albenis

texts.es: Albenis  de 20 años de edad vive en el municipio de Soledad con su cónyuge. El tiene un negocio a través del cual ofrece el servicio de estampado industrial y también vende mercancías variadas, como ropa, electrodomésticos menores y compact disk. Su emprendimiento data desde hace 1 año, cuando habiendo aprendido el oficio de estampado textil,  decidió ofrecer este servicio al ejercito de Colombia y le fue muy bien;  su negocio paso a paso ha ido creciendo y él ha agregado una actividad comercial, por eso vende también mercancía  variada, que trae de otro municipio del país,  donde consigue precios competitivos para ella hacer una buena oferta a su clientela. Su meta mas adelante es tener un local donde pueda ofrecer de manera independiente y mucho más confortable, el servicio de estampado, pues planea mas adelante extender su estructura de mercadeo,  a la que quiere impactar para ganar cada día un mayor clientela En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará telas para enviar a un taller, donde fabricarán camisetas, que él estampará posteriormente y con ello responderá a su pedido; además Albeins necesita comprar electrodomésticos menores, que han encargado sus clientes en su tarea de preventa y él  está muy seguro que le va a ir muy bien.
texts.en:
Albenis is 20 years old and lives in the city of Soledad with his wife. He has a business through which he offers industrial printing services; he also sells various merchandise, like clothing, small appliances, and compact discs. 

His enterprise dates back one year, when Albenis, having learned the textile printing trade, decided to offer this service to the Colombian army. It's going very well for him; his business has been growing little by little, and he added the retail business in which he also sells various merchandise that he brings from another city in the country. There he gets competitive prices for his merchandise so he can offer good deals to his customers. 

His goal for the future is to have a location where he can independently and more comfortably offer his printing services. Later, he plans to extend his marketing structure, with which he wants to make an impression so that he can continue winning more customers. 

Currently, he is applying for a Kiva loan—his first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo—with which he will purchase fabrics. He will send the fabrics to a workshop where they will make t-shirts that he will later print to respond to customer demand. In addition, Albenis needs to buy small appliances that his customers have ordered through his pre-sales work, and he is very sure that it will go very well.

loans.use: to buy fabric to send to a workshop where they will make t-shirts that he will print.

loans.name: Herculano

texts.es:
El Señor Herculano vive en su propia casa con su esposa e hijos, gracias a la ayuda de la Fundación pudo abrir su propia despensa con mercaderías variadas para poder llegar a la mayor cantidad de gente posible teniendo así un ingreso mensual capaz de ayudar a cubrir los gastos del hogar.
Es una persona trabajadora, que se empeña y pone todo su esfuerzo por salir adelante.
El motivo del préstamo sería para poder comprar la mayor cantidad de mercaderías como productos de limpieza, de aseo personal, alimentos no perecederos y seguir satisfaciendo así las necesidades de su clientela y generan aún mas ingresos propios.
texts.en:
Herculano lives in his own house with his wife and children.  Thanks to help from the Fundación he was able to open his own general store to reach the largest number of people possible and earn monthly income sufficient to cover household expenses.   He’s a very hardworking person who puts all his effort and dedication into his struggle to get ahead.

The reason for this loan is to buy larger amounts of merchandise like cleaning supplies, personal hygiene products and non-perishable food items to continue meeting customer demand and generating still more personal income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like personal hygiene products, cleaning supplies, food, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Don Miguel es una persona muy alegre y bastante sencilla que desarrolla su actividad laboral dentro de las ventas, comercializa celulares y accesorios a amigos y familiares. Es soltero y tiene una hija pequeña a la cual ve todos los fines de semana además de apoyarla con una asistencia familiar mensualmente. El cliente viaja los días sábado de madrugada para poder llegar a la feria de Oruro, donde puede comprar los celulares que comercializa, y también compra los mismos en la Huyustus donde por el tiempo que tiene esta actividad logro canalizar sus proveedores quienes le proporcionan estos a precios rebajados y convenientes para que pueda vender a mayor costo y generar sus ingresos. Don miguel quiere comprar más mercadería en accesorios, celulares para aumentar la variedad de su mercancía. No tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera profesional pues tuvo que mantenerse desde muy joven, trabajando en diferentes lugares desenvolviéndose en diferentes cargos. Aspira tener una familia a cual poder solventar con los gastos por lo que desea ahorrar o tener un negocio mas solido y así generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Miguel is a happy and modest man who makes his living selling cell phones and accessories to friends and family. He is single and has a young daughter whom he sees every weekend and to whom he provides monthly child support. Miguel leaves early on Saturday mornings to go to the Oruro fair, where he can buy cell phones to resell. He also buys them in Huyustus. Though it takes time to get there, he has been able to find suppliers who offer low prices that allow him to resell at higher prices and generate more income.

Miguel wants to buy more accessories and cell phones and increase the variety of merchandise he offers. He did not have the opportunity to study a profession because he had to support himself from a young age, working in different places at different jobs. He would like to have a family to support, and, therefore, he wants to save, have a more viable business, and earn more income.

loans.use: to buy cell phones and cell phone accessories for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy underwear, blouses, skirts and bedding

loans.name: Hugo Rene

texts.es:
Hugo, solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en mayor cantidad para el negocio, comprandose medicamentos ya sean químicos o también naturales, vitaminas, todo esto en diferentes presentaciones como jarabes, pastillas, inyecciones, esperando tener la aceptación de los clientes y un incremento en las ventas.

Con el préstamo anterior obtuvo un efecto positivo que le ayudó a mejorar e incrementar las ventas, hasta el momento sus ingresos han permanecido estables y considera que continuará creciendo en el negocio.
texts.en:
Hugo requests a new loan to buy larger amounts of merchandise for his business; he will buy medicine both chemical and natural and vitamins all in various presentations like syrups, pills and injections, hoping to be well-received by customers so sales will increase.

His previous loan had a positive effect in that it helped him increase and improve sales.  To date, his income has remained stable and he believes that his business will continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy syrups, pills and injections.

loans.name: Kuñatai Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre "Kuñatai" con mucho esfuerzo se encuentra en el 5° ciclo del programa.Es un grupo unido que se ayuda mutuamente para cumplir con sus ideales.Además del trabajo independiente de cada una también desarrollan actividades en forma conjunta  para recaudar fondos con el fin de contar con un capital dentro del grupo. La ayuda mutua es fundamental para poder llegar a los objetivos propuestos por el comité.
La Sra. María, quien se dedica a la venta de ropas como blusas, camisas, pantalones, polleras, etc. mediante el  crédito  pudo mejorar su negocio, conseguir mas mercaderías y sobre todo puede pagar los gastos educativos de sus hijos.
Solicita el crédito para seguir abasteciéndose comprando mercaderías para volverlos a vender a su clientela.
texts.en:
The “Kuñatai” women’s committee with much effort has begun its 5th cycle in the program.  It’s a united group that helps each other out in order to reach their goals.  In addition to the work they each do independently, they also carry out joint fund-raising activities to raise funds in order to have group capital available.  Mutual help is fundamental in order to reach the goals the committee has set.

María sells clothes like blouses, shirts, pants, skirts, etc. and the loan made it possible for her to improve her business and acquire more merchandise.  Above all, she’s able to pay her children’s schooling costs.  She’s asking for the loan to continue stocking up with merchandise to resell to his customers.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Hermel Gualberto

texts.es:
HERMEL TIENE 62 AÑOS ES CASADO VIVE EN SAN MIGUEL CON EL ESPOSO Y CON LOS HIJOS

SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA SIEMBRA DE MAIZ EN TERRENOS PROPIOS. EL DINERO LO UTILIZA PARA LA COMPRA DE INSUMOS Y FERTILIZANTES Y ABONOS LAS COMPRAS LAS REALIZA EN GUARANDA EN COMERCIAL
texts.en:
Hermel is 62  years old. He is married, and lives in San Miguel with his wife and children. 

He is farmer, and grows corn on his own land. He will use the money to buy agricultural supplies, fertilizers and manure. He will make his purchases at the store in Guaranda.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Barbra
